basics.name: Storekeeper II
basics.label: Inventory Management Professional
basics.summary: A professional with over 10 years of experience in procurement and purchasing. Has a friendly attitude and worm personality, known for building positive relationships with customers. Skilled at maintaining and reconciling inventory, processing purchase orders and interfacing with vendors. Commitment to serving and devoted to accomplishing tasks quickly and efficiently.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed inventory, provided customer service to Departmental and Fleet Maintenance Personnel, and acted as a trainer for Forklift Operator Safety. Also involved in shipping procedures.
highlights: Utilized PeopleSoft for procurement and receiving shipments
Processed work orders and fill Fleet Purchase Requisitions
Conducted inventory cycle counts and coordinated stocks

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsibilities included: Interviewing prospective employees, providing daily instructions to warehouse personnel and dispatching drivers, conducting routine cycle counts, verifying incoming shipments, and maintaining inventory and quality control procedures.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked as an aircraft hydraulic and structural systems mechanic as a member of Naval Aircraft Squadron VS-38.
